song_lyric:
I’ve	thought	my	path	was	formed
	The	shoes	I’m	wearing	is	badly	worned
	It’s	been	way	too	low
	The	strongest	of	rock	is	beginning	to	fall
	I’ve	nowhere	to	go
	Looking	for	souls	to	guide	me	through	the	door
	Oh	lo	and	behold
	Whoever	hears	me	please	open	the	door
	
	*	Oh	why	you	shutting	the	way
	The	Special	Agent	says
	You	gotta	run	from	the	pave
	Get	away	from	the	grave
	You	gotta	save	the	day
	This	is	your	license	to	pay
	Just	take	my	grace
	
	**	Can’t	take	it,
	Turn	to	run	away
	Can’t	fake	it	away	(Be	true	to	yourself)
	Masquerade	was	made	yesterday
	I	feel	like	searching	(Tomorrow)
	Can’t	stand	it,
	Something’s	gone	astray
	I	just	can’t	remain	(Be	true	to	yourself)
	Revelation,
	one	night,
	one	way
	I	feel	like	searching	(For	that	way)
	
	I	was	on	top	of	the	world
	Wore	fine-cut	pearls,
	diamonds	and	gold
	It’s	a	hard	fact	long	realized
	The	most	wise	man	can’t	weather	the	storm
	I’ve	nowhere	to	go
	Looking	for	souls	to	guide	me	through	the	door
	Oh	lo	and	behold
	Whoever	hears	me	please	open	the	door
